queue_name.description: The name of the queue the call should be put in. If a queue with a given name doesn't exist yet it will be created.

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.

command_id.description: Use this field to avoid duplicate commands. Telnyx will ignore any command with the same `command_id` for the same `call_control_id`.

max_wait_time_secs.description: The number of seconds after which the call will be removed from the queue.

max_size.description: The maximum number of calls allowed in the queue at a given time. Can't be modified for an existing queue.
